import React from 'react' import { calcTotalPrice } from '../utils.js' import { CartItem } from '../cart-item/cart-item.js' import './cart-menu.css' export const CartMenu = ({ items }) => { return (
{ items.length > 0 ? items.map(phone => ) : "Cart is empty" }

Total Price: { calcTotalPrice(items) }$
Finish order
: null }
